TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program: Cinematic Game Presentation

Articles.Content:
Hello my dear astronomers! (:

I've made a game presentation of kerbal space program.

In the first part I explain what this game deals about, in the second part (2:55) I show off my own creations.

Please watch it:

YouTube: Kerbal Space Program - Cinematic Game Presentation HD

I hope you like it (:

Please give recommendations what I could do better for a next video.

Thanks you & have a good day.

Sincerely,

Aerodefense
